entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 a.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 7:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches in low lying areas before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches in low lying areas early in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
